Quality Education.reason: Course emphasizes critical thinking and discussion on animal rights → relevant to Quality Education.
evidence: 期末報告 ：回想4次【作業】及【壞農業】
上課方式包括影片播放、老師講授，但格外著重課堂討論
每位同學作為一個世界公民，其與地球、自然、其他物種之關係

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: Course discusses exploitation of animals and ethical consumption → relevant to Responsible Consumption.
evidence: 人類對待動物的方式是哲學問題、經濟問題、科學問題、還是政治問題
動物亦然。因此，一如人類具備不可侵犯的基本權利，動物亦然
反省對其他動物的剝削利用

Climate Action.reason: Mentions '人為氣候變遷及疫情' → relevant to Climate Action.
evidence: 人為氣候變遷及疫情在內的全球環境裂化徵狀及後果正一一浮現之際
人類在不改變其與動物之關係的情況下，是否有存續的機會
人類對待動物的方式是哲學問題、經濟問題、科學問題、還是政治問題

Life on Land.reason: Focus on animal rights and welfare → relevant to Life on Land.
evidence: 動物福利對戰動物權
動物可以是商品對戰動物不該是商品
每位同學作為一個世界公民，其與地球、自然、其他物種之關係

Zero Hunger.reason: The course requires reading '《壞農業》' (Bad Agriculture) and analyzing one's relationship with animals in daily life, including food, which critiques industrial agriculture and food systems.
evidence: 《壞農業》ch.1-3
作業1：詳細紀錄你的日常生活（「食、衣…」）與動物的關係
The Game Changers

Good Health and Well-being.reason: The course description mentions '疫情' (epidemic/pandemic) as a consequence of '全球環境裂化' (global environmental degradation), linking human-animal relations to public health.
evidence: 包括人為氣候變遷及疫情在內的全球環境裂化徵狀及後果正一一浮現之際

Quality Education.reason: As a university course, it aims to trigger 'deep reflection' on students' roles as 'world citizens' regarding their relationship with other species, using debates and service learning.
evidence: 本課程探究每位同學作為一個世界公民，其與地球、自然、其他物種之關係。
期盼觸發每位同學對其在人類社會乃至由地球生靈共組之全球社會中所扮演角色之深層的省思。

Gender Equality.reason: The course uses the gradual elimination of '性別歧視' (gender discrimination) as a direct philosophical analogy for why humanity should also eliminate '物種歧視' (speciesism).
evidence: 透過性別歧視壓制女性的觀念及行為漸遭汰除，人類也應該開始反省對其他動物的剝削利用

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course discusses animals as '商品' (commodities) and critiques the '新自由主義經濟秩序' (neoliberal economic order), touching on economic structures and exploitation.
evidence: 「動物可以是商品」對戰「動物不該是商品」
文章2「新自由主義經濟秩序下之動物權幻影」
認知戰：青年低薪與動物利用

Reduced Inequalities.reason: The course's central theme is challenging '物種歧視' (speciesism) by drawing explicit parallels to other forms of inequality, such as '奴隸制度' (slavery) and '性別歧視' (gender discrimination).
evidence: 調整其完全排除其他物種利益考量的「物種歧視」觀念及行為。
人類透過奴隸制度剝削其他人類、透過性別歧視壓制女性的觀念及行為漸遭汰除

Sustainable Cities and Communities.reason: The course originated from a class on '校園流浪狗的認識與管理' (management of campus stray dogs) and requires service at a dog shelter, addressing urban animal management.
evidence: 延續原本開設11年之「校園流浪狗的認識與管理」服務學習課服務內容
每位同學一學期中必需赴狗場服務

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: The course directly addresses consumption by having students analyze their daily life ('食、衣…') and debates whether animals should be '商品' (commodities), critiquing production via '《壞農業》'.
evidence: 作業1：詳細紀錄你的日常生活（「食、衣…」）與動物的關係
「動物可以是商品」對戰「動物不該是商品」兩場大辯論。
《壞農業》

Climate Action.reason: The course explicitly mentions '人為氣候變遷' (man-made climate change) as a symptom of '全球環境裂化' (global environmental degradation) linked to human-animal relationships.
evidence: 包括人為氣候變遷及疫情在內的全球環境裂化徵狀及後果正一一浮現之際

Life Below Water.reason: A lecture title, '一隻鯨魚、一隻狗跟一隻豬的故事' (A story of a whale, a dog and a pig), explicitly includes a marine animal in the discussion.
evidence: 一隻鯨魚、一隻狗跟一隻豬的故事

Life on Land.reason: The course is fundamentally about human relationships with terrestrial animals, focusing on '流浪動物' (stray animals), '野生動物' (wildlife), and the ethics of animal exploitation on land.
evidence: 本課程以生活在我們周遭的流浪動物為引子
一路探索人類與地球上各種動物的關係
動保野保與禁餵問題

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: The course is grounded in political philosophy, debating concepts of '人權' (human rights), '動物權' (animal rights), and '動物公民' (animal citizenship) as matters of justice.
evidence: 輔以金利卡與唐納森的「動物公民」觀念
期末將舉行「動物福利」對戰「動物權」...大辯論
《動物公民：動物權利的政治哲學》

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course mandates a partnership with a local civil society organization through required student service at the '卓媽狗場' (Zhuo Ma's Dog Shelter).
evidence: 每位同學一學期中必需赴狗場服務
卓媽狗場志工臉書：https://www.facebook.com/zhuomamadog/
